title: Connection Error (When nothing is wrong with your internet connection or the server status)
body: Ok, this is actually freaking stupid, im getting tired of it and i want a fix and i want it NOW, just got done with the quick update thingy that happened today as i open up my patcher, i go to log in, AND I GET A CONNECTION TO PVP.NET ERROR. WTF?!?!?!?!?! THIS HAPPENS AT THE MOST RANDOM TIMES, and it pisses me off at a VERY high level, theres no fix that i know of, and ive tried many things. wtf is going on, why cant i play, fml.

replies.body: When you say quick update, what do you mean exactly?  Was it with Windows 7?  I've been seeing a few reports on this, so I'm curious to find out more.  There seems to be a network issue that's preventing you from connecting to our server.  In the meantime, you can use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to reconfigure your settings and get back in.  Let me know!
